long_description: The Momentum Pathfinder II watch features a clean design, analog alarm and lightweight titanium body and leather strap. It looks great on your wrist, no matter where your adventure takes you. Straightforward analog display features a date window, large digits and accurate quartz movement; luminous dial is easy to read, day or night. Loud alarm is easy to use. Solid titanium case is lightweight and strong; antiglare mineral crystal is heat tempered for impact resistance. Stylish leather band is comfortable and durable. The Momentum Pathfinder II watch is water resistant to 100m (330 ft.).
short_description: The Momentum Pathfinder II watch features a clean design, analog alarm and lightweight titanium body and leather strap. It looks great on your wrist, no matter where your adventure takes you.
